title: Where can I find the remainder of my XP Boost?  Someone .
body: I need to find out when my XP Boost expires before buying a new one.  Please help me out.

replies.body:
Hey!

After reading your request, I went ahead and took a look at your account.  It looks like you purchased the 3 day boost on the 20th, so it should already be expired by this point.  So if you are looking to buy a new one, today is the day to do it!

If you need anything else, hit me up!

Thanks so much to you!  I just don't know if a day=24hrs or the day of.    So the only way to keep track of the boost is to make note after I buy it? Any indicators?   

Well anyway, thanks again!!!
